mapper.insert: insert into bank_account(account_number, account_pwd, account_holder, account_nicname, account_id) values(#{accNo}, #{accPwd}, #{name}, #{accName}, #{id})
mapper.select: select account_number as accNo, account_holder as name, account_nicname as accName, balance, to_char(account_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as "date" from bank_account where account_id = #{id}
select no, acc_no as accNo, his_category as category, his_amount as amount, to_char(his_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as "date", his_name as name from bank_history where acc_no = #{no}
